orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = {	
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_1
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_5
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_10
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_15
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_20
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_25
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_30
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_35
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_40
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_45
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_50
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_55
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_60
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_65

	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_160
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_165
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_170
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_175
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_180
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_185
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_190
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_195
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_200
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_205
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_210
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_215
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_220
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_225
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_230
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_235
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_240
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_245
	remove_holding_modifier = orc_holding_population_250

orc_set_pop_modifier = {
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 1 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 5 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_1	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 5 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 10 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_5	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 10 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 15 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_10	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 15 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 20 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_15	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 20 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 25 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_20	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 25 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 30 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_25	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 30 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 35 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_30	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 35 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 40 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_35	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 40 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 45 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_40	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 45 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 50 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_45	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 50 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 55 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_50	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 55 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 60 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_55	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 60 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 65 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_60	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 65 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 70 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_65	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 70 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 75 }	
		}

		}		
	}

		limit = {

		}		
	}

		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_90	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 95 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 100 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_95	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 100 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 105 }	
		}

		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_100	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 105 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 110 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_105	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 110 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 115 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_110	
			years = -1	
		}

			modifier = orc_holding_population_235	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 240 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 245 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_240	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 245 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 250 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_245	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}			
	if = {			
		limit = {		
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 250 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 255 }	
		}		
		orc_remove_holding_pop_modifier_display = yes		
		add_holding_modifier = {		
			modifier = orc_holding_population_250	
			years = -1	
		}		
	}

			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value >= 255 }	
			check_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value < 260 }

}

orc_starting_population_set_up = {
	trigger_switch = {
		on_trigger = religion
		catholic = { PREV = { set_variable = { which = orc_rural_peasant_pop_catholic value = 7 } } }
		cathar = { PREV = { set_variable = { which = orc_rural_peasant_pop_cathar value = 7 } } }

	PREV = {
		set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop value = 0 }
		set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value = 0 }
		
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop which = orc_rural_elite_pop_catholic }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop which = orc_rural_elite_pop_cathar }

		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_waldensian }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_lollard }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_adoptionist }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_arian }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_orthodox }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_bogomilist }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_monothelite }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_iconoclast }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_syriac }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_maronite }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_miaphysite }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_monophysite }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_apostolic }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_paulician }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_tondrakian }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_nestorian }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_messalian }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_sunni }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_zikri }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_mahdiyya }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_nabawiyya }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_ibadi }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_kharijite }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_haruri }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_shiite }

		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_qarmatian }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_norse_pagan_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_norse_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_tengri_pagan_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_tengri_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_baltic_pagan_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_baltic_pagan }

		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_finnish_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_aztec_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_aztec }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_slavic_pagan_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_slavic_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_west_african_pagan_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_west_african_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_zun_pagan_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_zun_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_hellenic_pagan_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_hellenic_pagan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_bon_reformed }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_bon }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_zoroastrian }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_mazdaki }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_zurvanist }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_manichean }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_mandaean }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_yazidi }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_khurmazta }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_jewish }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_samaritan }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_karaite }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_hindu }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_buddhist }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_jain }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop which = orc_urban_lower_class_pop_taoist }
		
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop }
		change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop }
		
		location = {
			change_variable = { 
				which = orc_province_total_pop 
				which = orc_holding_total_pop 
				which = PREV 
			}
			add_province_modifier = {
				name = orc_population_display
				duration = -1
			}
		}
		
		orc_set_pop_modifier = yes
		
		
		
	}

}

orc_apply_pop_growth_effect = {
	if = {
		limit = {
			location = {
				chech_variable = { which = orc_province_natural_pop_ceiling which > orc_province_total_pop which = PREV }
			}
		}
		multiply_variable = {
			which = orc_province_natural_pop_ceiling
			value = 1.1
		}
	}
}

#############################################
# Pop Display effects						#
#############################################

orc_holding_ownership_display = {
	any_province_holding = {
		if = {
			limit = {
				holder_scope = {
					is_theocracy = yes
				}						
			}
			remove_holding_modifier = orc_ownership_city_charter
			remove_holding_modifier = orc_ownership_military_aristocracy
			add_holding_modifier = {
				modifier = orc_ownership_clergy
				years = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				holder_scope = {
					is_republic = yes
				}
			}
			remove_holding_modifier = orc_ownership_clergy
			remove_holding_modifier = orc_ownership_military_aristocracy
			add_holding_modifier = {
				modifier = orc_ownership_city_charter
				years = -1
			}
		}
		if = {
			limit = {
				holder_scope = {
					is_republic = no
					is_theocracy = no
				}
			}
			remove_holding_modifier = orc_ownership_clergy
			remove_holding_modifier = orc_ownership_city_charter
			add_holding_modifier = {
				modifier = orc_ownership_military_aristocracy
				years = -1
			}
		}
	}
}

orc_holding_total_pop_update = {
	set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop value = 0 }
	set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop value = 0 }
	set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop value = 0 }
	change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop which = orc_rural_elite_pop_catholic }
	change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop which = orc_rural_elite_pop_cathar }

	change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop which = orc_holding_total_lower_pop }
	change_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_pop which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop }
	
	location = {
		change_variable = { 
			which = orc_province_total_pop 
			which = orc_holding_total_pop 
			which = PREV 
		}
		add_province_modifier = {
			name = orc_population_display
			duration = -1
		}
	}
	
	orc_set_pop_modifier = yes
}

#############################################
# Building effects							#
#############################################

orc_holding_lower_pop_building_update = {
	
}

## Holding/Barony Title scope
orc_holding_elite_pop_military_update = {
	if = {
		limit = { # Making sure that you are of the right culture
			holder_scope = { culture_check_for_frankish_style_feudalism = yes }
		}
		if = {
			limit = { # If local wealth is not high enough, nobles serve on foot as they are rich enough for armor
				check_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth value < 10 }
			}
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop }
			multiply_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation value = 1000 }
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation which = orc_holding_wealth }
			divide_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation }
			multiply_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation value = 10000 }
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation }
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation which = orc_holding_wealth }
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop }
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 1 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 2 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_1
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 2 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 3 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_2
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 3 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 4 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_3
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 4 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 5 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_4
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 5 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 6 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_5
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 6 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 7 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_6
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 7 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 8 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_7
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 8 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 9 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_8
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 9 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 10 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_9
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 10 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 11 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_10
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 11 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 12 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_heavy_infantry_11
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value >= 12 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_heavy_infantry_numbers value < 13 }

			if = {

		}
		if = {
			limit = { # If local wealth is high enough, nobles can afford horses and serve mounted
				check_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth value >= 10 }
			}
			## Create a calculation variable from holding total pop and holding wealth, calculate how many knights the holding can afford to support.
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop }
			multiply_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation value = 1000 }
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation which = orc_holding_wealth }
			divide_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation }
			multiply_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation value = 10000 }
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation }
			
			## Assign modifiers according to orc_holding_final_knights_numbers
			## don't forget to remove the previous holding modifiers
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 1 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 2 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_1
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 2 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 3 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_2
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 3 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 4 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_3
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}

			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 4 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 5 }

			if = {

					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 22 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_21
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 22 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 23 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_22
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 23 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 24 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_23
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 24 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 25 }
				}

					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 1945 }

					years = -1
					hidden = yes

					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 1998 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_1997
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 1998 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 1999 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_1998
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 1999 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 2000 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_1999
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		
			if = {		
				limit = {	
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value >= 2000 }
					check_variable = { which = orc_holding_final_knights_numbers value < 2001 }
				}	
				add_holding_modifier = {	
					modifier = orc_holding_knights_2000
					years = -1
					hidden = yes
				}	
			}		

			
			## Reset counters
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_wealth_calculation which = orc_holding_wealth }
			set_variable = { which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop_calculation which = orc_holding_total_elite_pop }
			
		}	
		
		# set new counting variable same as upper class pop number
		# divide calc_pop by settlement wealth
		# multiply result by 10000
		# put the building depending on the value of the result of calc_pop through a dumb >= <
		
	}
	
}


add_manorial_buildings_stone_quality = {
	add_building = c_stone_manor
	add_building = c_manor_motte
	add_building = c_manor_moat
	add_building = c_manor_stone_gatehouse
	add_building = c_manor_stone_walls
	add_building = c_manor_stone_tower
}
